mapper.insert: insert into `user` (userId, password, company, companyPhone, companyContact, contactPhone, companyAddr, companyDescription, balance, agentId, priority, status, registerDate) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update `user` set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyPhone = #{companyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyContact = #{companyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPhone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyAddr = #{companyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyDescription = #{companyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, registerDate = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select userId, password, company, companyPhone, companyContact, contactPhone, companyAddr, companyDescription, balance, agentId, priority, status, registerDate from `user` where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
